topics.body: There is also a project to create glowing plants. This is being done by an amateur group, and the plants are expected to ship this year. I live in New Zealand though, which sadly has strict laws on genetically modified organisms in general. Glowing trees could be a good replacement for street lamps.

topics.body:
RIP WII WI-FI.

You were a laggy unresponsive piece of shit But you were my Laggy unresponsive piece of shit.

Memories~

You always save the best moments to repeat for me~
!http://nintendocharged.com/NChargedLibary/2012/09/tatsunoko-vs-capcom-art.jpg!

And I'm glad we could spend some of those moments on our Wii~

!http://i1.ytimg.com/vi/0lx0BGwN4bk/0.jpg!


Looong ago, I was hyped at home playing my, S.S.B.B~!

!http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2Wj4NghgByc/TmU9qD7oE0I/AAAAAAAAALE/eEerMO-fHjY/s1600/SSB-Brawl.jpg!

As we all fought for our Destiny~!

Oh Wii onliiiiine~

Oh How we spent our time~

so Diversallyyyyyy~!!

But my oh my~!

How I still enjoyed our tiiime~!

Just you and meeeee~

(Oooh just you and meeeee)

And we may have had bad times, But they were still online~

Oh Certainly~!
(Oooooh~ Oh Certainly~!)

But that was a ok~

Cuz we were together till today~

AND ALWAYS REAY TO PLAAAAAAY! OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOH YOU AND MEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE~!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!





But as the end is here~

I still love you dear~

Online with my Nintendo Wiiiiiiiii~!
!http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii31/Tawnnya/SSBB.jpg!

Rest in peace Wii Online. You did your job.

And now you can finally Rest.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
